dmca.title: DMCA Notification: Bigondigital.com/Clarion
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Jill Badlotto [mailto:jill@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 06, 2005 11:22 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Notification: Bigondigital.com/Clarion



 

December 7, 2005


SENT VIA Certified Mail
  Return Receipt Requested

7004 2510 0000 0307 1008

 

Designated Agent

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Re:       Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property 

To Whom It May Concern:

This office is authorized to act on behalf of Clarion in this matter.

            This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
